about_the_game:
Step into the world of Sushi Dreams, the ultimate sushi restaurant simulator where your creativity and business savvy collide. Own, manage, and grow your very own sushi restaurant, but things aren’t always as simple as they seem. On the grand opening day, everything goes wrong. A catastrophic event threatens to ruin your business before it even begins—can you save it?

As the owner, you’ll have to craft perfect sushi, manage your restaurant’s flow, and navigate a host of colorful characters—each with their own desires and challenges.

Features a wide variety of sushi types!

Design your own nyotaimori plates!

Recruit waifus!

...

and much more to come!

Add to wish list now to follow the dev log of the game!

content_descriptors.notes: As this game is a nyotaimori (body sushi) simulation game, some nudity will be depicted. However, there is a streamer mode in the game, off by default. If turned on, all characters wear proper clothing under all circumstances to make sure it's safe for general streaming purposes.

detailed_description:
Step into the world of Sushi Dreams, the ultimate sushi restaurant simulator where your creativity and business savvy collide. Own, manage, and grow your very own sushi restaurant, but things aren’t always as simple as they seem. On the grand opening day, everything goes wrong. A catastrophic event threatens to ruin your business before it even begins—can you save it?

As the owner, you’ll have to craft perfect sushi, manage your restaurant’s flow, and navigate a host of colorful characters—each with their own desires and challenges.

Features a wide variety of sushi types!

Design your own nyotaimori plates!

Recruit waifus!

...

and much more to come!

Add to wish list now to follow the dev log of the game!

name: Body Sushi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 360 (2GB VRAM or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 or AMD RX 580 (4GB VRAM or better)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card with surround sound support

short_description: A casual sushi restaurant simulator, but with waifus.
supported_languages: English, French, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
